meta.name: description
meta.title: Middle School Academic Enrichment Resources - Schoology for Students - COVID-19 - Home

meta.content: Website for Anchor Bay School District

div.p: Our building administrators and teaching staff have worked collaboratively to compile enrichment resources that families can utilize for continued learning during our mandatory closure. These continued learning opportunities are suggestions and are not mandatory or required homework. There are no formal student expectations to complete this work, or intent that it will be graded, but we encourage students to stay engaged.

img.a: Click here to access Special Education information and packets.

li.a: New York Times – 100 Writing Prompts for Students
